params._adapterParams: flexible bytes array to indicate messaging adapter services in L0
params._amount: amount of the tokens to transfer
params._dstChainId: L0 defined chain id to send tokens too
params._toAddress: dynamic bytes array which contains the address to whom you are sending tokens to on the dstChain
params._useZro: indicates to use zro to pay L0 fees

params._srcChainId: ChainId of the source chain - LayerZero standard
